casebody.data:
Trevor SHEPPARD, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Frank J. LENTZ, Esquire, and The Law Offices of Frank J. Lentz, LLC, Defendants,
and
Perskie, Wallach, Fendt & Holtz, PC, (n/k/a Perskie & Fendt, PC ), and M. Daniel Perskie, Esquire, Defendants-Respondents. C-760 September Term 2018
081604 Supreme Court of New Jersey. April 4, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000131-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
